Worlds.Description: 北海道・稚内市にある日本最北端の地、宗谷岬。 澄んだ空と海を望む景観を、3D ガウシアンスプラッティングで再現しました。 静かな海風と広がる空の下で、最果ての地の空気を感じてください。 Cape Sōya‚ located in Wakkanai‚ Hokkaido‚ is Japans northernmost point․ This VRChat world recreates the breathtaking scenery of the Sea using 3D Gaussian Splatting․ Take a moment to feel the serene breeze and the sense of standing at the edge of Japan․

Worlds.Name: When The Stars Join Us - Outer Wilds˸ EOTE
Worlds.Description: A remake and improvement of my first vibe-driven world‚ Light in the Fog․ ~ Most assets ＆ sounds are from Outer Wilds ~ A Dream Of Home cover by MikoWorksǃ ~ ⁄⁄ ~ It is a personal headcanon of mine for Outer Wilds˸ Echoes of the Eye that the Inhabitant's home moon was in an elliptical orbit around the ringed planet and‚ when the planet passed closest‚ a massive bloom of bioluminescence would envelop the moon as fireflies hatched in droves to reproduce‚ the foliage following suit in response to attract the swarms of potential pollenators․ The Inhabitants would celebrate these days‚ calling it something that would roughly translate to ＂when the stars join us＂․ Even as they tore their planet to the ground‚ they paused to celebrate as their planet bloomed in defiance of their actions one last time․
